featured.text: Flower and plant names like Heather, Rosemary, and Iris 36 this category.

definition.zh_def: 迷迭香，一種常用的香草，具有芳香的葉子，常用於烹飪和草藥療法。
definition.en_def: Rosemary is an aromatic herb with needle-like leaves, commonly used in cooking and herbal medicine.
definition.example: I added fresh rosemary to the roasted chicken for extra flavor.
